nodes.text: Gorensla Hutta was a moon of Kor Gorensla, a gas giant located in Hutt Space. It was the largest moon of Kor Gorensla.
Gorensla Hutta was one of the six moons that orbited Kor Gorensla, a gas giant located in Hutt Space that served as the throneworld of the Gorensla kajidic.
Gorensla Hutta was the largest moon of Kor Gorensla. It was also the first one to be settled by the Gorensla.

Gorensla Hutta was heavily terraformed and housed several important Gorensla estates. These estates were filled with ancient, exotic wares from across the galaxy. These valuable items represented great investments for the Hutts of Gorensla, as they often stored them in the hopes of revealing them decades or centuries later to make a tidy profit.
